title: DICOM C-STORE Intake Listener
note: Production PACS/modality intake endpoint.
whyNow: Stabilizes front-door ingestion as a prerequisite for all downstream automation

title: Case Prep and Queue Worker
note: Study preparation and asynchronous processing queue backbone.
whyNow: Provides deterministic preprocessing throughput for production-scale case flow

title: Dashboard + API Surface
note: FastAPI endpoints and operational dashboard already serving case workflows.
whyNow: Operational visibility and integration contracts are required for safe rollout and monitoring

title: HL7-Triggered Smart Prefetch
note: Relevant-prior prefetch from ADT/ORM events.
whyNow: Immediate throughput win with low clinical risk

title: Unified Worklist Orchestrator
note: Cross-list assignment logic by workload, subspecialty, and fairness.
whyNow: Reduces queue switching and unfair distribution

title: SLA Policy Engine
note: Breach-risk alerting before read-time failure.
whyNow: Turns SLA risk into actionable escalation before breaches materialize

title: AP Chest X-ray Assist APIs
note: Assistive X-ray flow integrations for report acceleration.

title: TotalSegmentator Core Pipeline

title: L3 Muscle Area + SMI Calculator
note: Structured body-composition support metrics.

title: Automated Organ Volumetry

title: Urgency Flagging and Reordering
note: Queue reprioritization with auditable confidence thresholds.

title: Opportunistic Liver Quant

note: Structured CAC-DRS-oriented opportunistic detection.

title: Hippocampal Volumetry Project
note: Longitudinal hippocampal volumetry project for neurodegeneration-oriented workflows.

title: Emphysema Longitudinal Quant
note: LAA%-driven burden trend support.
whyNow: Valuable but depends on segmentation throughput

title: Agentic Workflow Coordinator
note: Multi-step assistants for triage, reporting, and handoff execution.
whyNow: Long-horizon orchestration capability

title: Foundation Model Fine-Tuning Layer
note: Governance-controlled institutional adaptation of VLM/LLM models with safety gates and rollback.
whyNow: Institution-adapted model performance with controlled governance

title: Temporal Imaging Intelligence (Delta Engine)
note: Longitudinal change engine for prior/current imaging deltas and progression-aware interpretation support.
whyNow: Longitudinal change tracking for follow-up-heavy workflows

title: Causal Triage Simulator
note: Offline simulation of triage policies to estimate SLA, fairness, and urgency latency before production.
whyNow: Safe policy simulation before live queue changes

title: Synthetic + Federated Validation Sandbox
note: Unified privacy-preserving validation stack combining federated workflows and synthetic benchmarking.
whyNow: Privacy-preserving multi-site validation and benchmarking

title: Autonomous Follow-up Orchestrator (Human-Gated)
note: Suggested routing with explicit human approval gates.
whyNow: Strong continuity and financial recovery upside with clinical oversight

title: Prospective Trial Mode
note: Native trial-cohort and endpoint capture mode for publication-grade evaluation and reproducibility.
whyNow: Embedded publication-grade evidence generation

title: De-identification Gateway
note: Metadata and pixel PHI removal before external calls.
whyNow: Extend an implemented gateway with stronger policy and audit controls

title: Patient Follow-up Navigator
note: Reminder/escalation workflows with ownership.
whyNow: Converts follow-up intent into tracked operational ownership and completion flow

title: Urology Navigation Module
note: Rule-based routing for urology-sensitive findings.
whyNow: Direct care-continuity impact with clear rule set

title: Lung Nodule Longitudinal Tracker
note: Serial nodule tracking with growth and interval-aware follow-up triggers.
whyNow: High-prevalence longitudinal use case with clear follow-up impact

note: Longitudinal aortic diameter surveillance with guideline-aligned escalation rules.
whyNow: Enables guideline-aligned longitudinal surveillance and escalation at scale

title: Kidney Stone Burden Longitudinal Module
note: Longitudinal stone burden follow-up support.
whyNow: Strengthens continuity workflows with measurable urology follow-up burden tracking

title: Incidental Findings Closure Engine
note: From mention to documented closure.
whyNow: Directly addresses lost-to-follow-up risk from incidental findings in daily practice

title: Prostate MRI Longitudinal PI-RADS Tracker
note: Temporal PI-RADS and gland-volume trend tracking.

title: General Surgery Navigation Module
note: Routing for common surgery-continuity findings.
whyNow: Low-friction continuity value for common actionable findings

title: Oncology High-Suspicion Navigation Router
note: Urgent oncology routing for suspicious findings.
whyNow: High clinical-risk routing for ER/inpatient neoplastic suspicion

title: Gynecology Navigation Module
note: Structured routing for suspicious gynecology findings.
whyNow: Structured continuity for adnexal/uterine/cervical suspicious findings

title: Fracture Detection and Triage Module
note: Assistive fracture prioritization for trauma flows.

title: Bandwidth-Aware Transfer Scheduling
note: Deterministic transfer policies for constrained links.
whyNow: Improves reliability in constrained-network environments without clinical workflow disruption

title: Deterministic Pseudonymization + Crosswalk
note: Traceable privacy-preserving linkage across systems.
whyNow: Enables traceable privacy-preserving workflows

title: DICOMweb-Native Transport Layer
note: QIDO/WADO/STOW interoperability where DIMSE is suboptimal.

title: Follow-up Recommendation Extraction
note: NLP extraction of report follow-up actions.
whyNow: High value and operationally feasible

title: On-prem AI Policy Enforcement
note: Policy and outbound controls for enterprise deployment.
whyNow: Critical for enterprise deployment maturity

title: Pre-classification + Priority Flag (CXR)
note: LVI/MVP: normal vs altered plus assistive attention flag.
whyNow: Low-friction MVP lever with immediate queue-prioritization and time-to-open gains

title: Drift and Hallucination Control Framework
note: Needed before broad automation trust
whyNow: Needed before broad automation trust

title: Bone Lesion CT Pipeline
note: HITL workflow for bone metastasis/multiple myeloma candidate detection in CT
whyNow: Fastest low-cost path to deployable bone lesion assistive workflow with human review and continuous model improvement
backlogModule: Bone lesion CT assistive pipeline (TotalSegmentator -> nnU-Net -> MONAI Label)
obs: retraining loop and low-cost open stack.

title: Radiology Triage Agent
note: Autonomous agent to prioritize studies by urgency (e.g., fractures, hemorrhages), integrating segmentation and history through EHR/HL7.
whyNow: Accelerates time-to-read in emergencies, validated in recent simulations.

title: Multi-Agent Report Orchestrator
note: Orchestrator with specialized agents (image analysis, context extraction, structured drafting), with auditing and human editing.
whyNow: Outperforms isolated LLMs for complex workflows, as seen in multi-agent frameworks.

title: Agentic Report QA Gate
note: Post-draft multi-agent quality gate for factual consistency, image-text alignment, and confidence-scored escalation.
whyNow: Adds auditable safety controls before broad autonomous reporting adoption.

title: Guideline-Cited Recommendation Agent
note: Recommendation agent that attaches traceable guideline citations for follow-up and management suggestions.
whyNow: Reduces unsupported recommendations by enforcing citation-backed guidance in complex cases.

title: Subtle-Finding Triage Safeguard
note: Safety layer for high-risk subtle findings with mandatory fallback routing and conservative escalation logic.
whyNow: Mitigates undertriage risk in subtle presentations where autonomous urgency models degrade.

title: Prospective Shadow-Mode Validator
note: Prospective silent-run validation framework to measure clinical impact before affecting live care pathways.
whyNow: Creates decision-grade evidence for safety and performance before production influence.

title: Agent Drift and Bias Sentinel
note: Continuous subgroup-aware monitoring for drift, bias, and operating-context degradation with automatic rollback triggers.
whyNow: Prevents silent safety degradation as data mix and workflow context evolve over time.
